name: Thai-style Chili, Lime, and Cilantro Dipping Sauce
description: [Photographs: J. Kenji Lopez-Alt] Update your fried chicken with these no-cook dipping sauces in under 7 minutes » About the author: J. Kenji Lopez-Alt is the Managing Editor of Serious Eats where he likes to explore the science of home...
recipeIngredient: 2 cloves garlic, grated on a microplane grater
2 to 4 red Thai chilis, finely minced (or 2 teaspoons Sambal Oelek crushed fresh chili sauce)

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk all ingredients together in a medium bowl. Serve with fried chicken.
